name: God of Axe - VR survival game
name_original: God of Axe - VR survival game
description:
God of Axe VR is a survival VR game, that  let's you to experience the well known god of war axe throwing mechanic in first person view. The game has endless amount of waves of enemies, that become stronger after each wave. Kill them all, collect drops, become stronger to survive as long as you can!


Check out my other games and devlogs
